title: Nobility
summary: (As battleships are not player obtainable, there is no quote available for this ship.)
full_text:
Nobility
(As battleships are not player obtainable, there is no quote available for this ship.)
The Nobility is the Lycentian Battleship.
Overview
The Nobility is a lycentian battleship that can only be found in stronghold Contested Systems with capital shipyards. it takes 30 minutes to be built once a capital shipyard is constructed.
Advantages
As a lycentian battleship, it is predicted to have high shields and a turret agility buff.
Similar to other battleships, it is very hard to destroy due to high health and damage.
TBA
Disadvantages
Like all battleships, it is extremely slow.
TBA
